mapper.insert: insert into boardfile(bwno, filepath, filename) values(#{bwno}, #{filePath}, #{fileName})
insert into boardwrite(mno, bw_titl, bw_con, bw_wdt, bw_div) values(#{mno}, #{bw_titl}, #{bw_con}, curdate(), 'photozip')
mapper.select: select bf.bwno, bw_titl, bw_con, filepath, filename from boardfile bf, boardwrite bw where mno= #{mno} and bf.bwno = bw.bwno limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
